name: DogSpin
description:
Oh no! Frex and her pal Kalu are under attack by woodland creatures! How many can they fend off?

Frex and Kalu are leashed together, so use the arrow keys to both move Frex and swing Kalu. Kalu will eat anything that they touch, but bigger enemies will take longer to eat, restricting Frex's movement.

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021.
